name: Toilet Time
description:
This is the 2D Shooter Project I have completed for the Game Design and Development course on Coursera.

I have given the base game a major overhaul. All graphics, sounds and music have been updated. The game now has an isometric perspective and has 3 levels in different environments, following a loose story. I have also made minor code modifications such as adding a boss door in level 3 which opens when only one enemy is remaining and an introductory screen for each level. Enjoy!

Credits

Evan M Saarinen
